entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Rouyn-Noranda
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:42 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rouyn Airport 8:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.6°C

Visibility: 1.2 km

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm over southern sections. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with a few flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
